banner.slogan: <0>Web Development</0> is an art and your project is our <1>masterpiece</1>.
banner.main_paragraph1: I’m a <0>{{linkText}}</0>, creator of effective digital experiences and solutions <1>since I was 15</1>.
banner.paragraph1: <0>I develop web solutions</0> tailored to real client needs, <0>covering the entire process</0>: planning, design, development, documentation, deployment, and maintenance.
banner.paragraph2: Specialized in <0>Laravel, React.js, and Vue.js</0>, with a strong ability to <0>quickly learn new technologies</0> and apply them to solve complex problems efficiently.
banner.paragraph3: Proactive, organized, and solution-oriented. <0>Team player</0>. I manage time well and prioritize swiftly. <0>I adapt under pressure</0> and <0>seek challenges</0> that fuel my growth.
banner.description_tooltip: The mysterious one-man band, skilled at handling both front-end and back-end!
banner.portfolio_source_code_text: This site was built entirely by me — [View source code]

about_me.paragraph3_2: I dedicate most of my time to developing technical and soft skills that enhance my professional performance.
about_me.paragraph2_5: 'Do whatever it takes to learn what others are unwilling to learn, as fast as possible.' - Elon Musk.
